articles.title: 17th National Taekwon-Do Championship for Jongilbong Prize Opens
articles.content:
17th National Taekwon-Do Championship for Jongilbong Prize Opens 
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The 17th National Taekwon-Do Championship for Jongilbong Prize opened with due ceremony at the Taekwon-Do Hall Monday.
					 The championship brought together at least 500 players selected from provincial Taekwon-do teams and other units. They will compete in Taekwon-do and go.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, Taekwon-do players and coaches.
					
					 Kim Kyong Ho, chairman of the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee, made an opening speech.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony, there took place Taekwon-do demonstration.

articles.title: DPRK Wrestler Wins at 2014 Asia Junior Wrestling Championship
articles.content:
DPRK Wrestler Wins at 2014 Asia Junior Wrestling Championship
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- DPRK wrestler Kim Hyon Gyong came first at the 2014 Asia Junior Wrestling Championship held in Ulan Bator, Mongolia.
					 She beat her rival of Taipei of China in the girls free-style 48 kg preliminaries, her Indian rival in the semi-finals and her Chinese rival in the finals on June 7.
					
					 DPRK wrestler Sin Chol U bagged a bronze medal in the boys free-style 50 kg category.

articles.title: Nigerian State Government Secretary Leaves for Home
articles.content:
Nigerian State Government Secretary Leaves for Home
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Jidda Baba Ahmed, secretary of the Borno State Government of Nigeria, and his party left here for home Monday.

articles.title: State Merited Chorus Gives Its Premiere in Jagang Province
articles.content:
State Merited Chorus Gives Its Premiere in Jagang Province
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The State Merited Chorus started its performance tour of Jagang Province in Kanggye on Monday.
					 The performance began with male chorus "Song of the Korean People's Army". Put on the stage were colorful numbers such as orchestra and serial songs "Song in Praise of the Sun" and male solo and chorus "We Started from Scratch" and "Blessed My Life".
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the undying revolutionary exploits President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed by laying a firm foundation for the self-supporting national economy with their outstanding ideas and energetic leadership and thus consolidating the eternal bedrock for reliably protecting the dignity and sovereignty of Kim Il Sung's nation.
					
					 Also staged were male chorus "Nobody Matches the Marshal", male solo and chorus "Voice from My Heart" and male chorus "Peace Is Guaranteed by Our Arms." They represented the pride and self-esteem of the creators of the Kanggye spirit, pace-setters in the drive for breaking through the cutting edge and pioneers of the industrial revolution in the new century. 
					
					 The performance was highly acclaimed by the audience.
					
					 Among the audience were Kim Chun Sop, chief secretary of the Jagang Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and other senior officials of the province and workers. 
					
					 The performance goes on.

articles.title: Victory Is in Store for People Struggling for Justice and Progress: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Victory Is in Store for People Struggling for Justice and Progress: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The truth behind thrice-cursed atrocities in the past is being disclosed one after another and their victims were declared not guilty in south Korea. This is the stern judgment history passed on the "yusin" dictator, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The "yusin" dictator was the fascist tyrant without an equal who reigned over the people and the monstrous bloodsucker whose hands were stained with the blood shed by people.
					
					 Traitor Park Chung-Hee seized power through a horrible military coup. This was a curtain-raiser to the tragic bloodshed.
					
					 As soon as Park took the office, he massively beefed up repressive armed forces and mechanisms and threw a dense network of intelligence and watch across south Korea. He indiscriminately cracked down and killed the people who offered resistance against the country-selling policy of the authorities and supported the reunification through an alliance with the north, enforcing awful intelligence and terror politics.
					
					 No matter how desperately the fascist dictators hatch plots and resort to the suppression of the people, they can never stay in power for a long time.
					
					 The "yusin" dictatorial system shook to its very foundation in face of the indomitable resistance of the south Korean people for independence, democracy and reunification, and finally the dictator was shot to death by his confidant.
					
					 Several decades have passed since the dictator was removed from the arena of history, but the shuddering era of darkness is reviving and the same human rights abuses as those perpetrated in the period of the "yusin" dictatorship are being openly committed.
					
					 It is the steadfast will of the south Korean people not to tolerate the revival of the "yusin" dictatorship and the rule of brutal fascist crackdown.
					
					 Fascist crackdown is not a cure-all. Victory is in store for the people struggling for justice and progress, the article concludes.

articles.title: S. Korea's Bid to Tighten Military Nexus with Outside Forces Denounced
articles.content:
S. Korea's Bid to Tighten Military Nexus with Outside Forces Denounced
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- A few days ago, talks among military authorities of the U.S., Japan and south Korea took place in Singapore at which south Korea reaffirmed the importance of sharing information about "nuclear and missile threats from north Korea" with the U.S. and Japan and decided to continuously examine the issue. The talks also covered the issues of establishing a council for practical discussion on the systematization of information sharing and boosting the tripartite security cooperation. 
					 This clearly proves that the moves for tripartite military nexus have entered a very dangerous phase, Rodong Sinmun Monday says in a commentary. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The south Korean puppet authorities are increasing military cooperation with the U.S. against the DPRK while talking about "threat". This is pushing the already tense inter-Korean relations into a greater catastrophe and seriously disturbing peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and in the rest of Northeast Asia. 
					
					 The provocative acts prove that the Park Geun Hye group is rushing headlong into escalating confrontation with the DPRK and igniting a war against it, not opting for de-escalating tension for peace between the north and the south. 
					
					 It is not possible to mend the north-south relations or avoid a war as long as the Park group obsessed with dependence on outside forces and confrontation with the fellow countrymen is allowed to run amuck. 
					
					 The south Korean puppet authorities will face a final destruction if they continuously run amuck to provoke a war against the north in collusion with outside forces despite the bitter denunciation at home and abroad.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Lays Bare Aim Sought by U.S. in Talking about "Threat" from DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Lays Bare Aim Sought by U.S. in Talking about "Threat" from DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The vice-chairman of the U.S. Joint Chiefs of Staff in a seminar on missile defense blustered it is a top priority task of the U.S. MD to defuse the "missile threat" from the DPRK.
					 He said the U.S. is increasing combat readiness with all possibilities taken into consideration though north Korea has not yet test-fired an inter-continental ballistic missile capable of reaching the U.S. mainland and that cooperation among south Korea, Japan, Australia and other allies to cope with "threat of ballistic missiles" is very important.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a commentary in this regard: The accusation made by the U.S. against the DPRK over its war
					
					deterrence is nothing but a poor excuse to justify its MD.
					
					 The above-said outbursts let loose by the U.S. betray its cynical ploy to knock into shape a military bloc of NATO style in Northeast Asia in a bid to upset regional stability and strategic equilibrium and contain big powers in the region.
					
					 Washington is vociferating about non-existent "threat" from the DPRK to justify its pivot to Asia-Pacific strategy for aggression. But it will get it nowhere.
					
					 The DPRK has fulfilled its responsibility and role for peace and security on the Korean peninsula which is directly linked to the peace and security in Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					 It will as ever do its utmost for peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and in the region.
					
					 The U.S. criminal scenario to cook up the Asian version of NATO and dominate the Asia-Pacific region with it as a tool can never be justified but will certainly meet a fiasco.

articles.title: KCTU Demands Wage Increase and Guarantee of Right to Existence
articles.content:
KCTU Demands Wage Increase and Guarantee of Right to Existence 
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) held a meeting in Sejong City on June 5 demanding the authorities settle the wage issue and guarantee the right to existence.
					 The KCTU at the meeting said that plutocrats' purses are snowballing while the life of the workers is miserable. 
					
					 Nevertheless, the minimum wage committee is mulling cutting down the wages of the workers again, it noted, and continued:
					
					 The settlement of the wage issue is the most urgent one and the least demand of the workers for living as human beings.
					
					 Stressing the need to force Park Geun Hye to fulfill her promise to increase workers' wages, the organization declared it would carry on diverse actions to have the demands of workers met with the current meeting as an occasion. 
					
					 Prior to the meeting, the organization held a joint press conference with the Federation of Trade Unions of south Korea at which it held that the settlement of the wage issue is an urgent matter at present when the living of the workers has reached an abject destitution.

articles.title: S. Korea's Decision to Set up UN "Office for Human Rights in North" in Seoul Blasted
articles.content:
S. Korea's Decision to Set up UN "Office for Human Rights in North" in Seoul Blasted
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea in a statement Monday denounced the south Korean authorities for making a decision to set up in south Korea a UN "office for human rights in the north" and officially notifying the UN of the decision, defying the strong warning of the DPRK and public denunciation at home and abroad.
					 The statement said:
					
					 When meeting the former chairman of the UN "committee for investigation into human rights in the north" during his recent visit to south Korea, Park Geun Hye blustered an "epochal and fresh occasion is provided for investigating the human rights performance in the north" and that "she would let the citizens in the south and the north know about the human rights record in the north."
					
					 The Park group is driven into the worst ruling crisis due to the huge Sewol sinking disaster. Yet, it staged the farce of setting up the "office" and let loose reckless remarks after inviting the main player for it to south Korea. This proves that its human rights din against the DPRK has reached a reckless phase.
					
					 The UN "office for human rights in the north" is an anti-DPRK plot-breeding organization aimed at launching aggression and bringing down the social system in the DPRK, pursuant to the "report on human rights in the north" and the "resolution on human rights in the north" peppered with sheer lies that were cooked up by the U.S. and its allies.
					
					 As the public at home and abroad became more vocal denouncing and expressing concern about the establishment of the "office" in south Korea, the puppet forces made excuses that the "office" was not sponsored by them but was set up at the request of the UN.
					
					 It was none other than the Park group which played a key role in sponsoring the UN "office for human rights in the north" and setting it up in south Korea.
					
					 We have already strongly warned that the establishment of the "office" in south Korea is a hideous politically-motivated provocation insulting and mocking at the dignity of the DPRK and its people, a serious hostile act of denying and challenging the social system in it and a declaration of the confrontation of the social systems.
					
					 However, the Park group finally decided to set up the "office" in south Korea. So, we will strongly react against it.
					
					 Needless to say, the "office" and its staff are not excepted from being targets of this action.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Mexico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Mexico
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Step Up the Building of a Thriving Country by Applying Kim Jong Il's Patriotism" was brought out in booklet by the Publishing House of the Workers' Party of Mexico on June 3.
					 The work, published on July 26, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies the essence of Kim Jong Il's patriotism and deals with his life characterized by the noble love for the country and the people.
					
					 It also clarifies the important issues arising in applying Kim Jong Il's patriotism.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Austria
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Austria
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- An Austrian committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated in Vienna on June 3.
					 Eduard Knapp, chairman of the Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and the DPRK, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold diverse political and cultural events to praise the sacred revolutionary career of the President and his immortal exploits on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered by Regional Committee
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered by Regional Committee
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The Asia-Pacific Regional Committee for Remembering President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated on May 28.
					 Rachmawati Soekarnoputri, chairperson of the Founding Committee of the Soekarno Foundation for Education of Indonesia, Madav Kumar Nepal, former prime minister of Nepal, and P. Shiv Shankar, former foreign minister of India, were elected honorary chairpersons of the remembrance committee and Eko Suryo Santjojo, general chairperson of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia, Amar Jit Malhotra, senator from the Pakistan Awami National Party, Rashed Khan Menon, chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, Prasana Ranatunga, prime minister of the western provincial government of Sri Lanka, MP Rafael Mariano, president of the Philippine Solidarity Committee for Peace and Reunification on the Korean Peninsula, and Peter Woods, co-chairman of the Asia-Pacific Regional Committee for Supporting Peaceful Reunification of Korea, co-chairpersons of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold diverse political and cultural events and conduct solidarity movement to widely introduce the immortal exploits performed by the President and support the just cause of the Korean people for building a thriving socialist nation and achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Performed in Party Building Praised in Benin
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Performed in Party Building Praised in Benin
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- A national seminar took place in Cotonou, Benin on May 28 on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Hessou Kohovi, chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, made a report titled "Immortal exploits performed by leader Kim Jong Il in building the WPK" at the seminar.
					
					 He stressed that Kim Jong Il regarded it as the most important task to develop the WPK into the party of President Kim Il Sung, its founder, in the true sense of the word and successfully carried it out in the whole course of leading the party.
					
					 He said that Kim Jong Il set forth the Juche idea, the revolutionary idea of the President, as the only guiding idea of the WPK and proclaimed the modeling of the whole society on Kimilsungism as the supreme programme of the party.
					
					 Pascal Zouncheme, chief of the Benin Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism who doubles as rector of Cotonou Institute of Journalism of Benin, noted that under the leadership of Kim Jong Il the WPK could consolidate the single-minded unity of the leader, the party and masses as firm as a rock and demonstrate its might as an invincible party victoriously leading the cause of socialism amid the absolute support and trust from the broad masses.
					
					 Bonaventure Boy, professor of Abomey-Calavi University in Benin, stressed that Kim Jong Il developed the WPK into a powerful political force successfully guiding the cause of the Songun revolution.
					
					 A message of greeting to supreme leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Introduce Victory in Battles in Musan Area
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Introduce Victory in Battles in Musan Area
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee posted an article on its website on May 24 to mark the 75th anniversary of the victory in the battles in the Musan area commanded by President Kim Il Sung in the period of the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					 The article said:
					
					 The victory in the battles in the Musan area commanded by the President possessed of matchless pluck and rare wisdom was the victory of historical significance as it shook the harsh colonial rule of the Japanese imperialists to its very foundation. It clearly demonstrated the validity of the idea of attaching importance to arms, the idea of Songun.
					
					 The victory recorded a striking page in the history of the struggle for defeating the Japanese imperialist aggressors and liberating Korea.
					
					 It powerfully encouraged the Asian people in their struggle for achieving national liberation from colonialism.
					
					 The Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea posted a similar article on its website on the same day.

articles.title: Nigerian Organization Accuses Park Geun Hye of Reviving "Yusin" Dictatorship
articles.content:
Nigerian Organization Accuses Park Geun Hye of Reviving "Yusin" Dictatorship
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted an article titled "Daughter of the dictator" on its website on May 26.
					 The article said:
					
					 It is  35 years since the fall of the Park Chung-Hee's dictatorial rule which recorded a disgraceful page in the human history due to its torture politics and intelligence politics based on the ill-famed "yusin constitution" and "Security Law." But such dictatorial rule is reviving in south Korea at present.
					
					 Park Chung-Hee seized the "presidential seat" through a military coup and Park Geun Hye wrested the "presidential office" through an election coup, the politically-motivated coup.
					
					 After coming to power, Park Geun Hye ushered in the era of misfortune and the same dark era as his father's, not the "era of the people's happiness", by enforcing arrogant and self-righteous politics and running the show.
					
					 Not only the south Korean media but foreign media are commenting with astonishment that Park Geun Hye's seizure of power "ushered in an era of brutes and is leading to the revival of the Park Chung-Hee's era of fascist dictatorship."
					
					 The world came to know well about the real aim sought by Park Geun Hye in talking about "restoring the political honor of her father", "yusin" dictator. Her real intention is to revive the "yusin" dictatorship.
					
					 What is arousing greater concern of the international society is that she is reviving the conception of confrontation dating back to her father's era.
					
					 Park Chung-Hee earned an ill-fame by building the concrete wall for the permanent division of Korea, advocating the "two Koreas" policy and Park Geun Hye is pushing the north-south relations to a catastrophe, totally denying the north-south joint declarations supported and welcomed by the whole world.
					
					 But Park Geun Hye's scenario for confrontation with fellow countrymen in the north will not escape frustration as was the case with her father.

articles.title: Tienen lugar conversaciones ministeriales Corea-Gambia
articles.content:
Tienen lugar conversaciones ministeriales Corea-Gambia
Pyongyang, 9 de junio (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 5 en la sede del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de Gambia las conversaciones entre el canciller coreano, Ri Su Yong, que realiza una visita al pais africano al frente de la delegacion gubernamental de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, y su homologo anfitrion, Aboubacar Abudoullah Senghore.
					  En la ocasion estuvieron presentes, por la parte coreana, los integrantes de la delegacion visitante y el embajador coreano en Gambia y por la contraparte, el subsecretario general para las relaciones politicas bilaterales y el subsecretario general para la cooperacion multilateral del MINREX.
					
					  Ambas partes intercambiaron las opiniones sobre el desarrollo de relaciones de amistad entre los dos paises y otros problemas de interes mutuo.
					
					  El canciller gambiano dijo que admira los esfuerzos de Su Excelencia Kim Jong Un, Maximo Dirigente del pueblo coreano, por defender la soberania del pais, la paz y la seguridad de la region.
					
					  Expresando sincero agradecimiento por el apoyo del gobierno coreano al gobierno y pueblo de Gambia, ratifico la invariable posicion del gobierno gambiano de desarrollar en todas las ramas las relaciones de cooperacion entre los dos paises.
					
					  Destaco que su pais seguira fortaleciendo las relaciones de apoyo y colaboracion con la amistosa RPDC en la escena internacional.

articles.title: CRPP denuncia campana de DDHH contra RPDC
articles.content:
CRPP denuncia campana de DDHH contra RPDC
Pyongyang, 9 de junio (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria hizo publica el dia 9 una declaracion  de condena a la banda de los traidores surcoreanos que decidio instalar en el Sur de Corea la "Oficina de Derechos Humanos del Norte" de la ONU, pese a la advertencia fuerte de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la denuncia interna y externa del pais y lo informo oficialmente a la ONU.
					  Hace unos dias Park Geun-hye se reunio con el ex presidente del "Comite de Averiguacion de Derechos Humanos del Norte" de la ONU durante su visita al Sur de Corea, ocasion en la cual dijo que "se preparo nuevo motivo trascendental en la averiguacion de la situacion de DDHH del Norte, lo que dara a conocer a los habitantes del Sur y el Norte el estado de DDHH del Norte".
					
					  La horda de Park caida en la peor crisis de gobernacion generada por la tragedia del ferry Sewol, intenta instalar la oficina y pronuncio sin titubeo los disparates malsanos invitando hasta al autor de la campana anti-RPDC, lo cual demuestra que el complot de DDHH contra la RPDC ha llegado a la etapa imprudente.
					
					  La oficina arriba mencionada es el aparato intrigante que persigue la agresion y el derrocamiento del regimen de la RPDC fabricado en virtud del "informe de DDHH del Norte" y la "resolucion de DDHH del Norte" inventados por EE.UU. y sus fuerzas satelites.
					
					  Al elevarse en el pais y el extranjero las voces de censura y preocupacion a esta medida, los compinches titeres excusan que su instalacion se realiza por la peticion de la ONU.
					
					  Pero, la banda titere surcoreano son el autor que incito la fabricacion del "Comite de Averiguacion de Derechos Humanos del Norte" de la ONU,  introdujo en el Sur de Corea a los intrigantes internacionales de DDHH anti-RPDC, les ofrecio diversos datos falsos de censura contra ella, les hizo  reunirse con las escorias humanas y llevo a estos imbeciles hasta a la escena internacional para que hagan "testimonio".
					
					 Precisamente la banda de Park tomo la delantera en instalarla en el Sur de Corea.
					
					  La RPDC ya advirtio categoricamente que la instalacion de la oficina deviene la atroz provocacion politica de gran tamano que insulta y burla su dignidad y pueblo, el grave acto hostil que niega su regimen y le desafia y la declaracion de la confrontacion entre regimenes.
					
					  Dado que la banda surcoreana va a instalarla, la RPDC tomara medidas rotundas.

articles.title: Filmada nueva pelicula de ficcion en la RPDC
articles.content:
Filmada nueva pelicula de ficcion en la RPDC
Pyongyang, 9 de junio (ACNC) -- El colectivo de creacion Nunbora de los Estudios Cinematograficos de Corea acabo de filmar las primeras 5 partes de la pelicula de ficcion en serie "Zona de Batalla sin Detonaciones".
					El nuevo filme se basa en la novela larga de igual titulo.
					
					Describe a los combatientes revolucionarios que infiltrados en la zona enemiga inmediatamente despues de la liberacion de Corea (en agosto de 1945), luchan valientemente por descubrir el plan de guerra de agresion a Corea en aras de la seguridad del partido, el lider, la patria y el pueblo. 
					
					La pelicula infundira en los televidentes la verdad de que la gloria de la vida esta en el camino de seguir y apoyar fielmente a su lider.
					
					Continua la produccion de las partes posteriores.

articles.title: Inaugurado Campeonato Nacional de Taekwondo por Premio Jongilbong
articles.content:
Inaugurado Campeonato Nacional de Taekwondo por Premio Jongilbong
Pyongyang, 9 de junio (ACNC) -- Quedo iniciado el 17o Campeonato Nacional de Taekwondo por el Premio Jongilbong.
					En la ocasion se efectuaran los partidos de Taekwondo y Paduk con la participacion de mas de 500 jugadores seleccionados en varias unidades incluidas las selecciones provinciales de Taekwondo
					
					Tuvo lugar el dia 9 en el Palacio de Taekwondo la ceremonia inaugural del campeonato.
					
					Estuvieron presentes alli el secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Choe Ryong Hae y otros funcionarios, los jugadores y entrenadores de Taekwondo.
					
					Kim Kyong Ho, presidente del Comite de Taekwondo de Corea hizo uso de la palabra inaugural.
					
					Al termino del acto, hubo la demostracion modelo de Taekwondo.

articles.title: Coro Estatal Benemerito estrena en provincia de Jagang
articles.content:
Coro Estatal Benemerito estrena en provincia de Jagang
Pyongyang, 9 de junio (ACNC) -- El Coro Estatal Benemerito ofrecio su primera funcion en Kanggye de la provincia de Jagang en el marco de su gira artistica por localidades. 
					En la escena de la funcion iniciada con el coro masculino "Cancion del Ejercito Popular de Corea" se presentaron diversas piezas, entre otras, la musica orquestal y la cancion en serie "Cancion al Sol", el solo y coro masculinos "Hemos comenzado de la nada" y "Mi vida bendita", el coro masculino "Nadie vencera al Mariscal", el solo y coro masculinos "Voz de mi corazon" y el coro masculino "Nuestra bayoneta garantiza la paz". 
					
					Los ejecutantes elogiaron las imborrables proezas revolucionarias de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il quienes con sus destacadas ideologias y energicas guias asentaron la firme base de la economia nacional autarquica para defender con firmeza la dignidad y la soberania de la nacion del Sol. 
					
					Y estimularon el orgullo de los creadores del espiritu de Kanggye, precursores de conquista de los niveles de punta y exploradores de la revolucion industrial del nuevo siglo. 
					
					La funcion arranco la efusiva ovacion de los espectadores.
					
					La vieron Kim Chun Sop, secretario responsable del Comite del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en dicha provincia, y otros funcionarios responsables y los obreros de la provincia.
					
					Continua la gira artistica del Coro Estatal Benemerito.
